name: espresso Mind Map Document
summary: Learn about .CAMM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Espresso Mind Map is configured for touch handling with Windows 8 computers.

description: File created by espresso Mind Map, a program used for visually outlining information; saves a mind map, which is a diagram that represents a branching out of ideas, usually originating from a central word or category.
